CustomField.description: By default, a new resource is automatically created with each new user. Enable this option to only create resources for users with the "Standard" user type shown on each user record, determined by their profile. This setting can be used to filter out types including community users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: By default, a new resource is automatically created with each new user. Enable this option to only create resources for users with the "Standard" user type shown on each user record and ignore other types such as community user types.
CustomField.label: Only Create Resource For SF License
